sn1.8:1.2: Standing to one side, that devatā recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.8:2.1: “Those who are utterly muddled about things,
sn1.8:2.2: Who may be led into others’ doctrines,
sn1.8:2.3: Fast asleep, they have not yet awakened:
sn1.8:2.4: It is time for them to awaken.”
sn1.8:3.2: Who cannot be led into others’ doctrines,
sn1.8:3.3: Those awakened ones, having rightly known,
